wikitext.*:
'''Mythcon''' is the annual conference of the [[Mythopoeic Society]], typically held in July or August. Each conference has a theme, author guest of honor, scholar guest of honor, and may have additional special guests. Mythcon programming consists of papers, panel discussions, readings, entertainment, an art show, a dealers' room, banquet, awards, etc. which are planned out over a four-day event.
